title: LIST of U7000 PINS
message:
Thought it might be helpful when posting:

[FONT=Calibri][B]U7000/ ISL6259[/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Calibri][B]PIN 1: CHGR_AGATE[/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Calibri][B]PIN 2: PPCHGR_DCIN [/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Calibri][B]PIN 3: CHGR_ACIN[/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Calibri][B]PIN 4: CHGR_VFRQ[/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Calibri][B]PIN 5: CHGR_ICOMP[/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Calibri][B]PIN 6: CHGR_CELL[/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Calibri][B]PIN 7: CHGR_VCOMP[/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Calibri][B]PIN 8: CHGR_VNEG[/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Calibri][B]PIN 9: CHGR_AMON[/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Calibri][B]PIN 10: SMBUS_CHGR_SDA [/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Calibri][B]PIN 11: SMBUS_CHGR_SCL[/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Calibri][B]PIN 12: PP3V42_G3H_CHGR[/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Calibri][B]PIN 13: CHGR_RST_L[/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Calibri][B]PIN 14: CHGR_ACOK[/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Calibri][B]PIN 15: CHGR_BMON[/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Calibri][B]PIN 16: CHGR_BGATE[/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Calibri][B]PIN 17: CHGR_CSO_N[/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Calibri][B]PIN 18: CHGR_CSO_P[/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Calibri][B]PIN 19: PP5V1_CHGR_VDD[/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Calibri][B]PIN 20: PP5V1_CHGR_VDDP[/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Calibri][B]PIN 21: CHGR_LGATE[/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Calibri][B]PIN 22: PGND[/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Calibri][B]PIN 23: CHGR_PHASE[/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Calibri][B]PIN 24: CHGR_UGATE[/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Calibri][B]PIN 25: CHGR_BOOT[/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Calibri][B]PIN 26: CHGR_SGATE[/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Calibri][B]PIN 27: CHGR_CSI_N[/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Calibri][B]PIN 28: CHGR_CSI_P[/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Calibri][B]PIN 29: (AGND)THRM_PAD


I also found this helpful to study an example:[/B][/FONT]

[URL="https://www.it-tech.com.au/mac-q-a/macbook-power-up-sequences/"]https://www.it-tech.com.au/mac-q-a/m...-up-sequences/[/URL]

title: LIST of U7000 PINS
message:
I don't really understand why did you list ALL ISL6259 pins!
Not all of them need to be measured; depends of symptom.
Also each pin has assigned its function on the schematic.

However, the link is usefull for many people I suppose...

title: LIST of U7000 PINS
message:
More of a copy and paste to make it easier.
May not need all of them

I found myself needing it just to make notes
